author: Meera
text: Someone said that the first song you hear in the new year will determine how you live your life. I listened to Everlasting Shine by #TXT   Hoping for the best of 2022🤍

author: Meera
text: Is it bad that I already miss his long wolf hair cut? Or that I love his short black hair just as much? https://t.co/rgHgJuBgKy
